title: How to activate skin shard
body: I have a skin shard for Von Barron Veiger, I have Veiger and enough orange essence, but I cannot use the skin or have no idea how to use the essence? This is also the same for a ward skin. What do I do?

replies.body: You can just click on the shard itself to open up the shard menu while in your loot. You'll have options there to activate permanently, disenchant into essence, or even rent the skin for a limited time.
Left click on the skin shard and then click Unlock, it should tell you how much orange essence you need to unlock it.
